page.title: 14INDUSTRY IN ROBOROUGH.
page.content: Although Roborough is mainly a residential suburban area, with open countryside and farmland very close by, there is also quite a lot of light industry in the area. The Belliver Industrial Estate is being developed on land that was farmed until recently. It consists of several small industrial units. Various things are made in the units. Some of them are: kitchen units, car parts and accessories, double glazing, bakeries, sweets, cooked meats, and plastic containers. Beckton Dickinson is a large factory which makes medical equipment. Plessey are building a large new micro electronics factory which will bring jobs to a lot of people. Toshiba have a factory in this area too, one of several in Plymouth.
